arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

Interface Hamiltonian

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdhesionHamiltonian, AdhesionHamiltonian2D, AdhesionHamiltonian3D, HeightHamiltonian, JunctionHamiltonian, PersistenceHamiltonian, SubstrateHamiltonian, SurfaceHamiltonian, SurfaceHamiltonian2D, SurfaceHamiltonian3D, VolumeHamiltonian

    public interface Hamiltonian
    A Hamiltonian object represents a term in a CPM Hamiltonian equation.

    Each Potts instance is contains a list of Hamiltonian terms associated with the simulation. For each flip, changes in energy for all terms in the list are summed together to get the total change in energy.
